Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/IDE/registerAnnotator
Synopsis Register an annotator.
Function void registerAnnotator(str name, (&T<:Tree) (&T<:Tree input) annotator)
Usage import IDE;
Description Register a tree processor for annotating a tree with doc, link, or message annotations. See ParseTree for available annotations. The annotations are processed by the editor to generate visual effects such as error markers, hyperlinks and documentation hovers.
